channel.title: Kosovo Scape 317 have d claws ags and alot moreee
channel.description:
Wroking Assault 100% Working God Wars 100% Working Slayer 100% Working Veng 100% Prayer Works 100%(It includes Chivalry and Piety) Real dragon plate body (like the one in RuneScape, Not glitched) Working Summoing Cape(Not Glitched) Working Emotes 99% Fully working Assualt+new Assault reward interface Fully working pest control+new Pc reward interface Fight Pits Working 100%+new ground! Dragon claws 100% animated (4 hits on players and 2 hits on npcs) All 4 god wars bosses working and 100% animated! New 562 hit marks New RuneScape Hp Bar New Whip+Dharok axe model New 474 Log out tab New teleport interfaces!(Look down at the pictures) New teleport other! New Pk System New Gs Stance (Thanks to Slient Cj) New Gs Spec! (Thanks to deathchoas) PK Points System Shops NPC Dialogue Log in interface NPC VS. PLAYER Combat Fletching All ancient magic works (no farcast) All ancient magic works (with farcast) Some normal magic Veng Veng other Stat view Jad Minigame enjoy Edge 1v1 Mage Bank Varrock Team PK Dragon Claws 4 hit spec Normal emotes Special attack sounds (some wepons) Clan chat (Only 5%) Administrator + Moderator crowns Dharok effect Verac effect God wars dungeon (get godswords from here) KBD with magic + melee Starter package Fletching Guthan Effect Almost 100% all magics Correct 562 hits. Dragon claw special Dragon claw attack styles 100% magics on players. On all three spell books. Tons more that I can't remember..
Sorry for no picture ill added later the picture SERVER DOWNLOAD : http://uppit.com/v/M91CXFOY CLIENT DOWNLOAD : http://www.megaupload.com/?d=G33GTLKU or in http://uppit.com/alporiuyi1uh/Kosovo_scape_client.rar

item.title: Kosovo Scape 317 have d claws ags and alot moreee
item.dc:creator: @thebigpurpleglob thebigpurpleglob
item.description:
@thebigpurpleglob wrote:

[quote=“spy man47, post:1, topic:337007”]Hey, this is my second release of Pk Planet, this server is better than my first release, if you want to chek my first release here is the link for my first server!

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

And you can compare between these two!

Features:

[ul][]Wroking Assault 100%
[]Working God Wars 100%
[]Working Slayer 100%
[]Working Veng 100%
[]Prayer Works 100%(It includes Chivalry and Piety)
[]Real dragon plate body (like the one in RuneScape, Not glitched)
[]Working Summoing Cape(Not Glitched)
[]Working Emotes 99%
[]Fully working Assualt+new Assault reward interface
[]Fully working pest control+new Pc reward interface
[]Fight Pits Working 100%+new ground!
[]Dragon claws 100% animated (4 hits on players and 2 hits on npcs)
[]All 4 god wars bosses working and 100% animated!
[]New 562 hit marks
[]New RuneScape Hp Bar
[]New Whip+Dharok axe model
[]New 474 Log out tab
[]New teleport interfaces!(Look down at the pictures)
[]New teleport other!
[]New Pk System
[]New Gs Stance (Thanks to Slient Cj)
[]New Gs Spec! (Thanks to deathchoas)
[]PK Points System
[]Shops
[]NPC Dialogue
[]Log in interface
[]NPC VS. PLAYER Combat
[]Fletching
[]All ancient magic works (no farcast)
[]All ancient magic works (with farcast)
[]Some normal magic
[]Veng
[]Veng other
[]Stat view
[]Jad Minigame (63 Waves)
[]Bounty Hunter
[]Edge 1v1
[]Mage Bank
[]Varrock Team PK
[]Dragon Claws 4 hit spec
[]Normal emotes
[]Special attack sounds (some wepons)
[]Clan chat (Only 5%)
[]Administrator + Moderator crowns
[]Dharok effect
[]Verac effect
[]God wars dungeon (get godswords from here)
[]KBD with magic + melee
[]Starter package
[]Fletching
[]Guthan Effect
[]Almost 100% all magics
[]Correct 562 hits.
[]Dragon claw special
[]Dragon claw attack styles
[]Almost 100% magics on players. On all three spell books.
[*]Tons more that I can’t remember…[/ul]

[size=20pt]Now for the pictures :)[/size]

God Swords Spec :

http://img707.imageshack.us/i/gsspec.mp4/

Gs Stance,Walk,Running :

http://img41.imageshack.us/i/godsword.mp4/

http://uppit.com/v/P3SV9625

http://www.filefront.com/16181183/Pk%20Planet%20New%20Source!.rar

http://uppit.com/v/KWH4VM8B

[size=36pt]AND[/size]

http://www.filefront.com/16181455/Pk%20Planet%20Offical%20Client%20V6.rar

Credits :

  • Bashar (me, From my old server, Changed alot of things!)

  • Reverce (combattscape)

  • DemisPking (Some animated things)

  • Tayler (From deathzscape, took some Gfx,emotes…Etc…)

  • Tonic (Very cool interfaces + emotes)

  • Moparscape (Tuts,models,Etc…)

[size=36pt]Please Don’t Leech I worked Hard on the server[/size]

[size=36pt]Frequently Asked Questions[/size]

Question : My compiler doesn’t work wtf??
Answer : Click me for HELP!—> Credit to Pl0x15

Question : I couldn’t solve my compiler problem…
Answer : Just click me!—> Credits to tehcow

Question : How can I change it so I can give people mod/admin/donator/owner?
Answer : Go to Client.java (In the source files) and search for Bashar, Replace my name with you’rs

Question : What is the command to reset npc’s?
Answer : The command is ::resetnpc

Question : How to remove an item for donators only?
Answer : Get the items ID Example Santa hat is for donators, search in client.java for

if(wearID == 1050 && (donator != 1)) { // by Owner Bashar sM("You Need To Be A Donator To Wear This Item."); return false; }
Just remove it

Question : How can I change the client title and the ip?
Answer : To change the client title, search in GUI.java for

public static String frameTitlep

After that you will see the clients title “PkPlanet Client”
change that to you’r servers name
To change the ip, Search in GUI.java for “Serverip = “127.0.0.1”;”
Replace 127.0.0.1 with you’r server ip

Question : How can I make myself mod/admin/owner/hidden owner?
Answer : Go to Players>Chracters>YOU’RACCOUNT.txt
Then look for “character-rights = 3”
0 = Normal Player, 1 = Modeterator, 2 = Adminstrator, 3 = Owner, 4 = Hidden Owner

Question : In the Donator shop the items are 0 how can I change that?
Answer : Go to Source>Config>Shops.cfg
Search for “shop = 54 @gre@Donators Items!”
It should appear like this

shop = 54 @gre@Donators Items! 2 2 1050 0 1053 0 1055 0 1057 0 1038 0 1040 0 1042 0 1044 0 1046 0 1048 0 8102 0 6891 0 6893 0 6898 0 6895 0 6894 0 6891 0 6897 0 16005 0 16004 0 16003 0 1295 0 8100 0 13665 0 8002 0
Change all the 0 to the amount you want the shop to sell!

Question : How can I change the starter arena?
Answer : Go to Player.java and search for

toX = 3087; toY = 3492;

Change them to the place you want the starter to start…

Thanks for looking at my server! :):):):):)

  • Bashar[/quote]
    Proof that this was leeched and this also contains a virus in the stub.exe or w/e its called.
